title: McLarens, fires, and pro driver TJ Fry
description: This week Matt, Zack and I catch up on compound turbocharged McLarens, Huracans, wildfires and Jonathan Ward's new Icon Caprice. In the second half of the show Zack sits down with pro driver and /Drive contributor TJ Fry. Additionally we cover the Caterham 420r, British sheep and Matt says goodbye to the Focus RS.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
